opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Goord, Commissioner, New York Department of Correctional Services v. Lawrence

opinion:
535 U.S. 901

GOORD, COMMISSIONER, NEW YORK DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONAL SERVICES, ET AL.
v.
LAWRENCE.

No. 00-1619.

Supreme Court of the United States.

March 4, 2002.

1

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Porter v. Nussle, 534 U. S. 516 (2002). Reported below: 238 F. 3d 182.
